page.title: 06Leisure, Frisby Clubs
page.content: { FRISBY MON. Brownies, Youth club TUES. Flower club, Pram club WED. Women's Institute, Mothers' Union, Shape, Drop-in, Historical Society THURS. Friendship Club, Whist Drive FRI. Nil SAT. Football, Various activities SUN. Football, Cricket {FRISBY FLOWER CLUB} {Main Object:}To learn about flower arranging. Watch experts arrange flowers. Visit gardens and nurseries. {Activities:}Members arrange for charity and fun e.g. festivals to raise funds for Frisby church,Kirby church,Hoby church.Flowers and plants grown by members are sold for club funds.The club is 24 years old.
